Guide files are written in json (though you probably should use ingame editor for that!), and
file must be added in each directoy where index.html exists.

Required

table: Type of the guide, e.g. "mod". Used for sorting / easier viewing.
Absolute path to icon. You can use items as icons, e.g. "item:minecraft:apple". If this key is missing, icon.png from current folder will be used.
List of mod/modpack authors. If you only made the guide, don't list yourself here.
List of subpages. If this key is missing or value is empty, no subpages will be listed.
For mod type only - Used in minecraft to bind a guide to a mod, if guide ID doesn't match mod ID.

With the FTBGuides mod installed, you can:

list: View all guides ingame by clicking Guides button in inventory and save them for offline use.
